sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>e-mail sends to ServiceNow will create an incident with the requested fields</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Inbound action">5ba54b474f6ce3007e72aa95d310c7a1</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>All income emails (which are not reply / approve / other action) will create an incident which will be assigned to: 1st line of support group state = new (if the user is not already defined in the system, a new user record will be created in the system)</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001051</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>All incoming emails will create incident</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-19 13:15:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>80d54b474f6ce3007e72aa95d310c7c0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-25 19:31:29</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
